room_title: Escape room "The Italian Job" by Escape Brigade in Chicago
review: I've done few escape room games but this one is the best so far! Can't wait for the new stage these guys are working on

room_title: Escape room "The Italian Job" by Escape Brigade in Chicago
review: A lot of fun!!! Challenging and definitely ensures you work as a team in order to meet the deadline. Overall a great atmosphere and a fun night!

room_title: Escape room "The Italian Job" by Escape Brigade in Chicago
review: Come prepared to be mentally challenged and to train your eyes to really see what is right there in front of your face
